meanings.definition: The quality or state of being superlative.
meanings.sent1: Her superlativenesses in academics earned her the top spot in the class.
meanings.sent2: The superlativenesses of the mountain peak left the climbers in awe.
meanings.sent3: The cat's superlativenesses in napping were truly impressive.
meanings.sent4: His superlativenesses in kindness shone brighter than any star.
meanings.sent5: The superlativenesses of her singing voice brought tears to the audience's eyes.

meanings.definition: The use of superlatives in speech or writing.
meanings.sent1: The constant superlativenesses in his stories made them hard to believe.
meanings.sent2: Her speech was filled with unnecessary superlativenesses that made it hard to follow.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's superlativenesses in exaggeration always got a good laugh.
meanings.sent4: The superlativenesses in his advertising campaign made the product seem irresistible.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's superlativenesses in praise motivated the students to do their best.
